entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.2.44
entry.summary:
Overview * This release is only for Gen2/Gen3/Gen4/Gen5. Improvements
[UAP] Make band steering less strict. [UAP] Improve overall stability.
Bugfixes
[UAP] Fix IPv6 inform address resolution not working (affects L3 adoptions). [UAP-Gen2/3] Fix incorrect TX Retries being reported by UAPs. More fixes coming in future Network application releases.
Additional information
U6-Pro/Mesh needs to be upgraded to 5.67.0 first before upgrading to 5.68.0+. Instead of using the manual links, you can also subscribe to your desired firmware channel, as described here. Please refer to this article to find more details on how to identify your Access Point generation. All URLs use HTTPS. This assumes your device(s) are running 3.7.56 or later and that the device's date is properly set. Please change URLs to HTTP for device(s) running earlier firmware or if the date is incorrect (e.g. if device can't reach a NTP server).
Any and all feedback is welcome, including lettings us know about successful device upgrades. When reporting an issue, please ensure that you include the following information:
Network Application version. Firmware version (previous and current). Device model(s).

entry.title: UniFi LTE 6.2.43
entry.summary:
Overview * This release is currently a Release candidate. Improvements
[LTE] Update LCM messages. [LTE] Improve LTE module firmware update process.
Additional information
U6-Pro/Mesh needs to be upgraded to 5.67.0 first before upgrading to 5.68.0+. Instead of using the manual links, you can also subscribe to your desired firmware channel, as described here. Please refer to this article to find more details on how to identify your Access Point generation. Your device built-in display may turn black or unresponsive for ~10 minutes after firmware upgrades to upgrade LCM firmware. All URLs use HTTPS. This assumes your device(s) are running 3.7.56 or later and that the device's date is properly set. Please change URLs to HTTP for device(s) running earlier firmware or if the date is incorrect (e.g. if device can't reach a NTP server).
Any and all feedback is welcome, including lettings us know about successful device upgrades. When reporting an issue, please ensure that you include the following information:
Network Application version. Firmware version (previous and current). Device model(s).

entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.2.41
entry.summary:
Improvements
[UAP] Improve overall stability by fixing kernel crashes.
Bugfixes
[UAP] Fix band steering causing certain clients to disconnect and reconnect to 2.4GHz in a loop. [UAP-Gen4/Gen5] Fix nightly DFS reset not working. [UAP-Gen4/Gen5] Skip U-NII-3 channels in UK and Latvia when auto channel is configured. Latvia regulatory allows low power only; UK has a lot of outdoor interference on these channels. [UAP-Gen4/Gen5] Fix 5GHz radio broadcasting before DFS CAC occasionally without allowing new connections.
Additional information
U6-Pro/Mesh needs to be upgraded to 5.67.0 first before upgrading to 5.68.0+. Instead of using the manual links, you can also subscribe to your desired firmware channel, as described here. Please refer to this article to find more details on how to identify your Access Point generation. Your device built-in display may turn black or unresponsive for ~10 minutes after firmware upgrades to upgrade LCM firmware. All URLs use HTTPS. This assumes your device(s) are running 3.7.56 or later and that the device's date is properly set. Please change URLs to HTTP for device(s) running earlier firmware or if the date is incorrect (e.g. if device can't reach a NTP server).
Any and all feedback is welcome, including lettings us know about successful device upgrades. When reporting an issue, please ensure that you include the following information:
Network Application version. Firmware version (previous and current). Device model(s).
